description:
Sniper King, a mysterious warrior from the island of snipers, lends a hand as Franky and Sanji try to fight their way to Robin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Mysterious Man Appears?! His Name Is Sogeking!
Nazo no Otoko Toujou!? Sono Na wa Sogeking!
Un homme mystérieux entre en scène ! Son nom est Sniperking !
Герой из ниоткуда?! Его зовут Согекинг!
謎の男登場!? その名はそげキング!
